title: playing card font or similar
content:
Looking to ID this font and/or find suggestions of fonts that might go well with this as a website banner.

Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160126im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/72o_5149.jpg)

 [‹ one million years b.c. (boobies inside)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160126/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43088 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type needs identifying ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160126/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43111 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Juggling man

comments.content:
The nicest numbers I’ve found to match playing cards are part of the Numbers series from Hoefler Frere-Jones.

[http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100018](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160126/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100018 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100018")

This might also be of help:

[http://www.haroldsfonts.com/cardchars.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160126/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/cardchars.html "http://www.haroldsfonts.com/cardchars.html")
